firstSectionTitle: What is San Diego Tech Hub?
firstSectionDescription: San Diego Tech Hub represents a movement aimed at changing the perception of the San Diego tech ecosystem.  Our focus is to be a conduit for change connecting businesses, organizations, and individuals, leveraging their resources and talents to build a stronger San Diego tech community through collaboration.
secondSectionDescription: The whole is greater than the sum of its parts. Working together towards a single goal is the backbone to drive transformative change.  San Diego Tech Hub believes this can be accomplished by following these 3-steps:

secondSectionItems.title: inform
secondSectionItems.description: Be open to knowledge sharing by providing access to resources and teaching others; helping to build awareness.

secondSectionItems.title: connect
secondSectionItems.description: Be active in building relationships and working with others that compliment your talents to promote professional growth.

secondSectionItems.title: empower
secondSectionItems.description: Be a conduit for change challenging the status quo, creating opportunities for others along the way.

thirdSectionDescription: The Pillars of Excellence is a framework to organize our thoughts around transformative change.  While each pillar can stand on its own, our goal is to help others identify and create synergies across pillars enabling businesses, organizations, and individuals to build bridges aimed at redefining tech hub for the greater San Diego area.

thirdSectionItems.title: community
thirdSectionItems.description: Provide a means to support those who struggle in the technology field.

thirdSectionItems.title: education
thirdSectionItems.description: Help bridge the knowledge gap ensuring relevant tech trends are learned.

thirdSectionItems.title: inclusion
thirdSectionItems.description: Be a champion to those that are not exposed to the right opportunities.

thirdSectionItems.title: innovation
thirdSectionItems.description: Encourage others to solve problems from a different perspective.

thirdSectionItems.title: talent
thirdSectionItems.description: Capitalize and market our differentiators to attract and retain top talent.
